aria-required-attr.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-required-attr.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-required-attr.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-required-attr.fix: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

aria-required-children.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-required-children.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-required-children.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-required-children.fix: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

aria-required-parent.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-required-parent.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-required-parent.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-required-parent.fix: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

aria-roles.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-roles.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-roles.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-roles.fix: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

aria-valid-attr-value.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-valid-attr-value.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-valid-attr-value.brand: To be determined based on specific violation

aria-valid-attr.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-valid-attr.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-valid-attr.fix: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

form-field-multiple-labels.desc: Chaque tableau de données complexe a-t-il un résumé ?
form-field-multiple-labels.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
form-field-multiple-labels.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
form-field-multiple-labels.fix: Form field must not have multiple label elements

definition-list.desc: Chaque tableau de données complexe a-t-il un résumé ?
definition-list.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
definition-list.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
definition-list.fix: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

dlitem.desc: Chaque tableau de données complexe a-t-il un résumé ?
dlitem.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
dlitem.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
dlitem.fix: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

listitem.desc: Chaque tableau de données complexe a-t-il un résumé ?
listitem.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
listitem.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
listitem.fix: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

th-has-data-cells.desc: Chaque tableau de données complexe a-t-il un résumé ?
th-has-data-cells.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
th-has-data-cells.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
th-has-data-cells.fix: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

input-image-alt.desc: Chaque image porteuse d'information a-t-elle une alternative textuelle ?
input-image-alt.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
input-image-alt.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
input-image-alt.fix: Image buttons must have alternative text

aria-input-field-name.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-input-field-name.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-input-field-name.fix: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

aria-command-name.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-command-name.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-command-name.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-command-name.fix: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

aria-hidden-body.desc: Chaque cadre a-t-il un titre de cadre ?
aria-hidden-body.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-hidden-body.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-hidden-body.fix: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body

aria-meter-name.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-meter-name.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-meter-name.fix: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

aria-progressbar-name.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-progressbar-name.brand: To be determined based on specific violation

aria-roledescription.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-roledescription.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-roledescription.fix: aria-roledescription must be on elements with a semantic role

aria-toggle-field-name.financial: To be determined based on specific violation
aria-toggle-field-name.brand: To be determined based on specific violation
